overview: With a hot start at the Staxus office, Ron and Rob are horny as hell, so opposed to doing it in the kitchen where they'd be interrupted constantly, they take their action to the bathroom, where unfortunately they get caught again before going to the library where they know they won't be bothered and will be able to fuck all they want! Tyler and Ron don't disappoint neither with their under the cover action, boy can Ron ride well! In the third part, Beno gets a good taste of Rob as they have some testosterone fueled sex on the sofa. And last but not least Ray with innocent looking Jacob Dolce, who will for sure have you creaming in no time!
title: Twink Adventures
